TopicTitle: Just started the other day and I already made a YouTube video...

Articles.Content:
First off, hello! I'm leptoon. I just found KSP about two days ago and I can't think of any game I like better. Over 28 hours of game time so far and I'm about to begin construction of a lunar base. Here's the landing of a giant rover that will facilitate placement of the base modules. Thanks for making this game, I can't tell you how long I've been waiting for something like this! SpaceBuild in Garry's Mod doesn't even come close, and Orbit is way too complicated for me. KSP is crazy awesome.

Anyway, my first video. Please watch it with English captions turned on. I'll put the text of the next video in the image itself...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OBU-UgO1me4

Edited June 24, 2013 by leptoon

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thanks!

I just found out about KSP less than a week ago and I've already started building a station and a lunar base.

Edited June 24, 2013 by leptoon
